Title: Great service
Content: I visited the shop in Norwich with a combination of old lenses, used camera's and accessories for trade in/up to buy a new camera to ideally take away on the day. The sales assistant (Dave) worked with me for around 1.5hrs to work through this. His product knowledge was excellent, everything I wanted was in stock and he worked through the trade in/up, money off etc offers to come up with the best price. Great service. Couldn't have been better.

Title: Really competitive prices and great service too!
Content: Really competitive price, so much so I was initially suspicious!  (this was my first purchase). All was great though - fast delivery and exactly as advertised.  Delighted.  Would certainly buy again.

Title: The drive left my delivery at the wrong…
Content: The drive left my delivery at the wrong address.  No explanation.  No card through my door.

Title: Great Service
Content: Easy to order. Used items are always as described. Delivery is quick.

Title: Fast delivery
Content:
Fast delivery, had it in stock and always a easy service 
Highly recommend

Title: Great service
Content: Great quality used item delivered within the timescale quoted, excellent service as always

Title: Good experience
Content: A really quick and helpful experience and what I wanted arrived safely and exactly in the condition that was advertised. The option to compare items helped me extremely well.

Title: My purchases were delivered within 24…
Content:
My purchases were delivered within 24 hours to the Isle of Wight using standard delivery, can't ask for more really can you?
Wish my normal mail came that quickly!!

Title: Great service
Content: Item as described and very good delivery

Title: Item in stock
Content:
Item in stock 
Good price 
Next day delivery 
Will definitely use again

Title: Excellent service we use them again…
Content: Excellent service we use them again arrived really quickly thank you

Title: Prompt service
Content: Immediate dispatch, fast delivery and as advertised.

Title: This was not the first pre-owned item…
Content:
This was not the first pre-owned item that i have purchased from Wex and i would not hesitate to use them again.
The description is always very accurate and priced well.
I also traded in a Lens that i have not used for a while.(just sitting in the draw).Was offered more than i expected and used this to purchase a camera body.
So i would advise you all, if its not used sell it.
Must also add both transaction where very quick and trouble free
